title: How to modify the path BCD of UEFI Windows

forumNotes.author: meoit
forumNotes.content:
Hello all!  

I have problem about modifing the path BCD of Windows (UEFI)  

Normal, UEFI BCD located in C:\\EFI\\Microsoft\\Boot\\BCD  
I want to change this path to C:\\EFI\\MyPath\\MyBoot\\BCD  

Someone help me with Tool !  

THANKS ALL.

forumNotes.author: Guest_AnonVendetta_*
forumNotes.content: Hmm...........how about with.......oh, I don't know.........BCDEdit?!

forumNotes.author: Wonko the Sane
forumNotes.content:
NIcely symmetrical with this one:

[http://reboot.pro/to...-in-windows-xp/](http://reboot.pro/topic/21234-how-to-change-the-path-bootini-of-ntldr-in-windows-xp/ "")

with the added complication that BOOTMGR, besides checksummed is also compressed.

There are several threads about this.

[http://reboot.pro/to...usb-sub-folder/](http://reboot.pro/topic/8043-booting-vista2008w7-from-usb-sub-folder/ "")

[http://reboot.pro/to...ffset-question/](http://reboot.pro/topic/16069-bootmgr-offset-question/ "")

[http://reboot.pro/to...r-of-windows-8/](http://reboot.pro/topic/16824-how-to-modify-bootmgr-of-windows-8/ "")

There is a nifty program for that in the above thread, here:  
[http://reboot.pro/to...ows-8/?p=195982](http://reboot.pro/topic/16824-how-to-modify-bootmgr-of-windows-8/?p=195982 "")

see if it works on UEFI (never tested it, but I believe it is for the BIOS path only, i.e. it edits the BOOTMGR and not the BOOTMGR.EFI, but cannot really say)

The (Russian) topic is here:  
[http://www.usbtor.ru...topic.php?t=562](http://www.usbtor.ru/viewtopic.php?t=562 "External link")

version 1.34 right now.

@TheAntiFinder

JFYI BCDEdit edits the BCD, not it's location/path/name, which is hardcoded to \\boot\\BCD (on BIOS) and \\EFI\\Microsoft\\Boot\\BCD (on EFI/UEFI)

forumNotes.content:
THANKS WONKO!

CONTY9 BMPLUS V1.3.4 only can modify LEGACY WinNT6.x LOADERs (as BootMGR), it not support for UEFI.

forumNotes.author: meoit
forumNotes.content: Final, I hexed \*.efi by using HexEdit. Load very OK. :smile:
